messages.message:
Hi Team, We see below error in the CASS SaaS UAT env while calling LLM model via refiner. The functions called is `call_model_converse` . We checked the license in Admin->License and we could see the license is present(please confirm if this is correct - SS attached).  Can someone please advise on this.(Please redirect if this is not the right channel).
ticket: https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/6211
```        "log": "record=40051767220.pdf.ibmsg column=__validate_all_field_prompt_json text=Error: Exception Incorrect API key provided: sk-Miro9***************************************40ls. You can find your API key at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys."```
this might be an open ai api key issue. can someone from <!subteam^S05BKGLP267> help out?

@Aaron Tami @Ashwin can you look at this please?

@dg did this just start to fail?

Do we keep track of expected keys -> environment anywhere? The possible scenarios are 1) key was changed in the environment, 2) OpenAI deactivated this key because we were seeing a similar error message in that case, or 3) it was deactivated by someone else
Also just for my own understanding, do these environments send requests to AIHub which proxies to openAI or do they go direct to OpenAI
@shaunak yes I think. As confirmed by @chatur this was working in CASS Dev env.
Let me check if dev and UAT use the same key
this API key is one of the keys that was deleted during IBHack a few months ago, so this UAT env definitely needs a new key
how do we manage open ai api keys across saas environments?
Do we want to generate a new key for this env or is it fine to share the same one as dev?

see this thread for more info https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C053W8B06EL/p1694613376236419?thread_ts=1694543942.072889&cid=C053W8B06EL

jtau and fernando would be the most familiar with the new process

> Do we want to generate a new key for this env or is it fine to share the same one as dev?
idk - i assume we should ask @jtau / @fernando?
The new process only works for environments > 23.07, weâ€™ll have to update the key manually here
confirmed dev and uat use different keys
@Ashwin should we reset the keys here?
Sorry should have replied in this thread, I updated the key for UAT to match dev at 2:19 PM EST, however I didnt restart model service bc i wasnt sure if that was allowed
Thanks for resetting the keys.  Given this is a UAT environment, please restart the model service pods as well.
